title: 1 BED 1 BATH ON THE BEACH
posting_body: ["1 BED 1 BATH ONT HE BEACH! , close to Hollywood's hot spots like the Aventura Mall and the Diplomat Hotel and Spa.", 'Your backyard is just steps away from the sandy beaches of Hollywood, The Tides has a state of the art gym, business center, heated pool and many other amenities to enjoy and relax.', 'Porcelain tiles all over the apartment.', 'Rent includes wifi and basic cable .', 'AVAILABLE AUG 10', '3901 S Ocean Dr # 8Q HOLLYWOOD, FL 33019-3002', 'PROPERTY ID:  GTA11247661', 'Type of Property:CONDO', 'List Price:\t$2,150', 'Bedrooms:  1', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'SqFt (Liv):¤812', 'CALL OR TEXT TODAY', 'show contact info', 'Global Trust Realty, LLC posts properties for a 30 day period of time.', ' Due to current high rental demand, some properties advertised may be withdrawn, cancelled, rented, pending or sold within the past 30 days.', ' All prices are subject to change based upon availability.', 'All information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.', 'Listed and Brokered by:Beachfront Realty Inc']
